alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 19 at 9:29AM EDT until October 20 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Freeze Watch, temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland and Higher Elevations of Fayette Counties. In West Virginia, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, Preston and Eastern Preston Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect outdoor plumbing and tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
